trans-unit.source: Represents a secure client session for user activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en sikker klientøkten for brukeraktivering, lisens-bindingen og andre rights management-operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, SecureEnvironment is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: Som med andre <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>typer SecureEnvironment brukes bare i fullstendig klarering programmer.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the ApplicationManifest specified when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter ApplicationManifest angitt når den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref> ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The application manifest specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*> method when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> is created.
trans-unit.target: Programmanifest som er angitt til den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>metoden når den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref> er opprettet.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session for a specified user with a given rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en sikker klientøkten for en angitt bruker med en gitt rettigheter manifestet.

trans-unit.source: This Create method is intended for use with users that are already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne Create-metoden er ment for bruk med brukere som allerede er aktivert, slik som er oppgitt i listen som er returnert fra <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method for users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: Bruk alternativt <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>metode for brukere som ennå ikke er aktivert.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: Programmet rettigheter manifest.

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren eller brukergruppe for å gi tilgang til rettigheter behandlet innhold.

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: En sikker klientøkten for aktivering, lisens-bindingen og andre rights management-operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session given an application rights manifest, <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en sikker klientøkten som er angitt et programmanifest rettigheter <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This Create method is intended for new users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: Denne Create-metoden er ment for nye brukere som ennå ikke er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Activating a new user includes a roundtrip server transaction to obtain the User Certificate and Client License Certificate.
trans-unit.target: Aktiver en ny bruker inneholder en tur-retur server transaksjon for å få brukersertifikatet og lisens klientsertifikat.

trans-unit.source: The alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method can be used if a user is already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den alternative <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>metoden kan brukes hvis en bruker er allerede aktivert, slik som er oppgitt i listen som er returnert fra <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: Programmet rettigheter manifest.

trans-unit.source: The method of authentication.
trans-unit.target: Metode for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The type of the user rights account certificate.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags rettighetskontosertifikat for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: En sikker klientøkten for aktivering, lisens-bindingen og andre rights management-operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The application should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må kalle avhending når <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> er fullført

trans-unit.source: After Dispose is called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> are reclaimed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: Når avhending kalles, ressurser tildelt av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>gode av saneringsoppsamlingen.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> is released.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før den siste referansen til det <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>er utgitt.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the instance's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis avhending ikke kalles, ressurser tildelt av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamlingen kaller forekomsten <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>Aktiverer beskyttede fjerningsmetoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>referanser.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the activated users.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en liste over aktiverte brukere.

trans-unit.source: A list of the currently activated users.
trans-unit.target: En liste over brukere som er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: Angir om en angitt bruker er aktivert for å få tilgang til rettigheter behandlet innhold.

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren eller brukergruppe for å gi tilgang til rettigheter behandlet innhold.

trans-unit.source: if the given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte user er aktivert for å få tilgang til rettigheter administrert innhold; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Removes the license activation for a specified user.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner aktiveringen lisens for en bestemt bruker.

trans-unit.source: The user authentication must be performed either with Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenning av brukere må utføres enten med Windows-godkjenning eller Passport-godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The user to remove the license activation for.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren fjerne lisensaktivering for.

trans-unit.source: The user parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The user parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The given user is not authenticated with either Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte user ikke er godkjent med Windows-godkjenning eller Passport-godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or user-group specified when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter bruker- eller brukergruppe angitt når den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref> ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*> method when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren eller brukergruppen angitt til den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>metoden når den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref> ble opprettet.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>
